p: Ethical approval of the ZIFAG cohort was given by the “Comité de Protection des Personnes Sud-Mediterranée” corresponding to the “Etude descriptive prospective de la maladie a virus Zika au sein de la communaute de defense des Forces Armees en Guyane—ZIFAG” and was registered on 29 February 2016 as RCB: 2016-A00394-47. Written consent was obtained from all participants [ 20].
